definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The developments and current situation of tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鉭鈮溼法冶金技術的發展概況和現狀。

sentences.english: The project belongs to metallurgic mineral field.
sentences.chinese: 本項目屬冶金礦產領域。

sentences.english: VD electric furnace is a king of degasification equipment from molten steel during steel making process.
sentences.chinese: VD爐是冶金行業冶煉過程中的一種鋼液脫氣設備。

sentences.english: Metallurgists of the time are not thought to have known about this technique.
sentences.chinese: 人們認爲當時的冶金學家並不瞭解這種技術。

sentences.english: Copyright by Metallurgical Machinery Goods & Materials CO. Shantou S. E.
sentences.chinese: 汕頭經濟特區冶金機械物資公司版權所有。

sentences.english: The advantages and applications of powder metallurgy materials in electrical appliances are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了家用電器中的粉末冶金材料的特點和應用慨況。

sentences.english: Powder Metallurgy is a process for making parts from metal powder.
sentences.chinese: 粉末冶金是用金屬粉末製作部件的過程。

sentences.english: China Metallurgical Group, often called M. C.
sentences.chinese: 中國冶金科工集團，簡稱M。

sentences.english: The metallurgical principles of the above results are studied, also.
sentences.chinese: 本文對試驗結果還進行了冶金學原理的分析。

sentences.english: The fine grain of pure tantalum can be obtained easily through PM.
sentences.chinese: 粉末冶金法較易獲得細晶粒組織。

sentences.english: Nowdays, these kinds of composites are mainly fabricated by powder metallurgical method or cast-questing method.
sentences.chinese: 目前其製備工藝主要採用粉末冶金法和擠壓鑄造法。

sentences.english: This product is manufactured by powder metallurgy through compacting and pressure working.
sentences.chinese: 本產品系採用粉末冶金方法經壓坯和壓力加工而製成。

sentences.english: Ground granulate blast furnace slag (GGBFS) is a by-product of the iron and steel manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣是中國鋼鐵業大量排放的一種冶金廢渣。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes the recent development in gold metallurgy in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 概括介紹俄羅斯金冶金技術發展狀況，以饗讀者。

sentences.english: This will lead to the downstream metallurgy and juki slowdown in demand.
sentences.chinese: 這將導致對下游冶金和重機需求放緩。

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
chemical industry, abbr. to 化工[hua4 gong1]
non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
